title: Circulation of the Arizona Republic 2018
summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
The Circulation is highest at Day Sunday and lowest at Day Daily.
The difference of Circulation between the highest and lowest Day is 248319.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Day in the x axis and Circulation in the y axis.
Day Sunday has the highest Circulation and Daily has the lowest Circulation.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
The Circulation is highest at Day Sunday and lowest at Day Daily.
The difference of Circulation between the highest and lowest Day is 248319.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 2 columns on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
The maximum Circulation 378602.0 is found at Day Sunday and the minimum is found at Daily where Circulation is 130283.0.
The Circulation of Day Daily is 2.91% smaller than the maximum value at Sunday.
The average Circulation in all 2 Days is 254442.5.
